subject: Coaches and Managers
Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Mexico fired Coach Victor Manuel Vucetich after only two games in charge. He will be replaced by Miguel Herrera for two playoff games next month against New Zealand.
snippet: Mexico fired Coach Victor Manuel Vucetich after only two games in charge. He will be replaced by Miguel Herrera for two playoff games next month against New Zealand.
